page.title: 16Fiona's Thursday
page.content: On rising in the morning I dress, go through for breakfast, brush my teeth and go out to the bus. Later when the mini-bus has taken me to school, I play with my friends until 9:05 when lessons start with the Scottish Religious Service on the radio. Next we do language until playtime.Our visiting art teacher then shows my class some art work until dinner time. After dinner we do maths before watching Music Time on TV. When the bell goes we go home on the bus. At home I go and play with my friend until 5:00 before running home for tea and going to the majorettes in Cupar. When I get home I make my packed lunch for the next day, bath, watch TV and go to bed.
